About the Mission

Tip: Highlight a word to see its definition.

Grace in the Margins

This space was born from a deep conviction: that God is not absent in life’s interruptions, but profoundly present. Whether in silence, suffering, or unexpected detours, His sovereignty weaves redemption into every story.

Grace in the Margins is a place to explore that truth — through devotionals, reflections, and testimonies that speak to the quiet ways God moves. It’s a creative and theological journey shaped by scripture, storytelling, and the belief that no moment is wasted in His hands.

Here, you’ll find encouragement to see your life through the lens of eternity, and to trust that even in the margins, grace abounds.
